context_of_use: The customer accesses the order tracking feature through the system interface.
scope: The system allows customers to view the status of their orders and track shipments.
description: Allow customers to view order status and shipment tracking information for their purchases.
triggering_event: Customer requests to track an order.
preconditions: Customer must be logged into their account.
Customer must have at least one order placed.
postconditions: Customer successfully views the status of their order.
assumptions: The system has access to real-time order status and tracking information.
requirements_met: The system must provide order tracking functionality.
The system must display accurate order status.
main_flow: 1. Customer selects the 'Track Orders' option → System displays a list of the customer's orders.
2. Customer selects a specific order → System retrieves and displays the order status and tracking information.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the customer has no orders, the system displays a message indicating no orders are available.
information_for_steps: 2. Order status and tracking information from the system database.
